TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void KeyPressEventHandler(object sender, KeyPressEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed KeyPressEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub KeyPressEventHandler(sender As Object, e As KeyPressEventArgs)
public delegate void KeyPressEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, KeyPressEventArgs ^ e);
type KeyPressEventHandler = delegate of obj * KeyPressEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: Um que contém os dados do evento.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: Representa o método que manipulará o evento de de .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Definir para `true` para cancelar o `KeyPress` evento.Set to `true` to cancel the `KeyPress` event. Isso mantém o controle processe o pressionamento da tecla.This keeps the control from processing the key press. Quando você cria um delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obter mais informações sobre como manipular eventos com delegados, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples [!code-cpp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/VB/form1.vb#1)]
